title: Analyze Opponent's Strategy
description: A coach needs an analysis of their next opponent's playing style and tendencies.

tasks.description: Gather video footage and statistical data from the opponent's last five games.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete dataset for the opponent.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to identify common formations, set-piece strategies, and key player tendencies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the opponent frequently uses a high-press defense and targets their star striker on counter-attacks.

tasks.description: Generate a pre-game report for the coaching staff highlighting the opponent's key strategies and potential weaknesses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a concise, actionable report for the coaches.
